channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: Stock market today: Asian shares fall after Wall St ends worst week; Biden withdraw from 2024 race
item.description: Asian stocks are mostly lower after President Joe Biden exited the 2024 race. The downbeat start to the week followed losses on Wall Street on Friday as businesses around the world scrambled to contain disruptions from a massive technology outage.

item.title: Alaska police and US Coast Guard searching for missing plane with 3 people onboard
item.description: Alaska authorities are conducting a search for a missing airplane with three people onboard. The state Department of Public Safety says Alaska State Troopers received a report from the U.S.

item.title: Utah death row inmate who is imprisoned for 1998 murder asks parole board for mercy ahead of hearing
item.description: Utah officials are set to hear testimony about whether a man facing execution should be spared the death penalty and remain imprisoned for life.
